data.text: We are adding frequencies to our Malaga route and will be flying there daily in July. 🇪🇸 You can find all the flights to Malaga from our website: https://t.co/906IMFcH8u https://t.co/R41F8OfMOS
@OMI1602 Hi, Finnair has direct flights between Delhi and Helsinki in 5 Aug 2020 - 31 May 2021. I'm afraid we don't have direct flights between Delhi and London. //Katja

data.text:
Happy #WorldEnvironmentDay! Today we’re celebrating biodiversity and the important role
that aviation can play in helping protect wildlife #ForNature and people. 🐘🐢🦜 @ROUTESPartners @IATA https://t.co/v619LWaIuN
In May, we operated 263 cargo-only flights. Finnair carried 26,700 passengers, which is 65% more than in April. Read more: https://t.co/dm1iQsIV1q https://t.co/HOOKX4vFtY
@Davidyu94145207 Hi, I understand and apologize for that. Unfortunately it currently takes 10 to 12 weeks for your refund to be processed. //Jukka-Pekka

data.text: @AnitaIrmeli Hei Anita, pääsemme sosiaalisessa mediassa vastaamaan viesteihin saapumisjärjestyksessä, kiireisissä asioissa kannattaa suosia reaaliaikaisia kanaviamme chatia tai puhelinpalvelua. Pyytäisin sinua poistamaan varaustunnuksesi tästä, vastaan sinulle FB:n viestiin suoraan. 🙂 /Katja

@QueParenElMundo Hola, Maria:

¿Me puedes facilitar el código de su reserva o billete con el teléfono de contacto, tambien el correo electronico en un mensaje privado?

Saludos,
Jose

Most of our fleet is now parked at @HelsinkiAirport. We can't wait to see these birds back where they belong: up in the sky, taking customers all over the world. Read more how we take care of our sleeping beauties in the meantime: https://t.co/9La4QN1ZyN https://t.co/3zU6x70YkU
RT @FinnairCargo: Transforming our two A330 aircrafts for cargo only use was a success! Mika Kilpinen from operations team reveals the deta…
@trustftrade Hi! Unfortunately all our flights to Athens are cancelled until March 2021. // Helmi
@saarinen_antti Hei Antti! Vastasin yksityisviestiisi. //Anu

@RahulGu04090889 Hi Rahul! I just answered to your DM. /Minna

data.text: We are resuming flights to Denmark and will start our daily operations to Copenhagen 2nd of June. 🇩🇰 You can find all the flights to Copenhagen from our website: https://t.co/906IMFcH8u https://t.co/udp78c1UM7
@MsMarmitelover Hi! Please notice I answered to your DM.//Anu
@BejanShirvani Hi, please remove the public tweet with your booking reference. Instead, please send us DM with the reference and flight route and date. /Keijo

@JensAusHamburg Hallo Jens, 
Vielen Dank für die Rückmeldung. 
Hat sich die Anfrage jetzt erledigt?
Mit freundlichen Grüßen,
Dilyana Teodosieva
@GoIroiro Hi! No, we are not going to do that. /Minna

data.text: As Norway has lifted their work-related entry restrictions starting 1st of June, we can start our operations to Oslo already 8th of June. 🇳🇴 You can find all the flights to Oslo from our website: https://t.co/906IMFcH8u https://t.co/bijhtTdL5d

@LiuLiu57387189 Hi! Unfortunately we currently have 8-12 weeks delays in the refund processing due to a high volume of coronavirus related refund applications.  I understand the inconvenience, hopefully the refund would be in order soon. -Hanna
@RahulGu04090889 Hi, if you want us to have a look at your reservation, then please send us a DM with your booking and contact details. Otherwise you should contact the travel agency. //Mari

urls.title: Order quality products to your seat or home | Finnair Shop
urls.description: Finnair Shop offers a wide selection of goods ranging from travel essentials, cosmetics and homeware to products from popular Finnish brands. Use Finnair Plus points, money or a combination of both for your purchase.

data.text: @Marjo_Kaszonyi Hi, award points expiration date is not extended, but you can extend this yourself with 18 month by using or purchasing  some points. You can for an example also donate some points to charity via: https://t.co/1CAVS7V10i //Mari

@pekkasmusic Hei Pekka, lentojen hinnat määrittyvät dynaamisesti kysynnän ja tarjonnan mukaan. Nyt kun lentoja on heinäkuusta lähtien vain 30 % normaalista määrästä ja monet haluavat matkustaa kesällä, niin siellä saattaa olla hintojen nousua joidenkin reittien kohdalla. /Krista Finnairilta

@JensAusHamburg Hallo Jens,

Danke für Ihre Mitteilung. Haben Sie vielleicht eine Buchungsreferenz? Könnten Sie uns kurz schildern, worum es bei Ihrer Anfrage geht, leider konnte ich den Link nicht öffnen, den Sie mitgepostet haben.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen,

Dilyana Teodosieva

data.text: @dwarfedplant Hi Pirita, two cats can be shipped in the same pet carrier if they get along well and can travel comfortably together. Only one box per passenger is allowed in the cabin. Kindly check that there is room for the pets from customer service, before you book your own flights. /Katja

data.text: @sktbiyhakyfotg Hi! If your booking has been made via us, you can first cancel the booking here: https://t.co/sthXHFVZLv and then request refund here: https://t.co/oFFK2IPFcB. If you wish us to take a look, please DM your booking reference, passenger name(s) and also travel dates. //Anu

@RepoTanja Thank you. We can see that your refund request is in the handling queue. Average refund handling time is 8-12 weeks. You will get an email when refund has been processed. If you need more information, please send a DM as latest message that we can reply to your DM.😊
-Saara
@heatherjanemill Hi, I have sent you a DM. //Mari

data.text: RT @jarimakinen: Did my first flight booking in 4 months. Feeling alive. @Finnair and @AirFranceFR (@KLM was still too difficult) https://t…

@BertholdRalf Hi, unfortunately we are not able to see your messages. Please send us a new DM with your contact details, so that we can check if we are able to find a new suitable flight for you. //Mari
@tiffnine23 Hi, we have flights for sale, but it depends on from where and when you will travel. You should also check if there is any possible travel restrictions via the authorities. //Mari
@florensmacario Hi, I have sent you a DM. //Mari

We cancel several flights to other destinations as well as of 1 July. Up-to-date travel periods can be checked on our booking engine and on the Destinations pages. We’ll cancel the flights from our systems gradually by 30 June 2020.

More information: https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X

How do I know if my flight is cancelled?

You’ll see the list of routes that are entirely cancelled on 1 July 2020 - 31 March 2021 from here: https://t.co/PzQHmJza2Z https://t.co/TVsuhYydFx

@muulika Hi, thank you for your question! Naturally, we continue to follow how air travel recovers, but we do not expect to be able to start operations to those cancelled destinations by end of March 2021. /Krista from Finnair

@RepoTanja Hi! Unfortunately, the handling time for refunds is very long at the moment, around 8-12 weeks. If you want us to take a look on your booking could you please DM us your booking reference, passenger name(s) and route?//Anu

@marpar83 Unfortunately Chicago is on our cancellations list, which can be found here https://t.co/wcwbNLDAoa - If you need assistance, please DM us your booking reference, travel dates, names of the passengers and e-mail address on the booking so we can have a look at this. /Elli

@thezerowastedi1 Let's see if we can help you out here :) Please DM us your issue with the booking reference, names of the passengers, travel dates and e-mail address on the booking so we can identify you and get to it :) /Elli
@thewineisfine Hi! Apologies, I guess this question for you was irrelevant. However I'm happy to hear about your experience with Finnair :) //Anu
@SofiaFwk Hi! Could you please DM us your booking reference, passenger name(s) and travel dates so I take a look? //Anu

urls.title: Travel updates
urls.description: Helsinki Airport is the ideal place to start and finish your journey. All flights depart from and arrive in one terminal. We currently have delays in the refund handling due to a higher than normally volume of refund applications. Finnair leases an A320 aircraft from DAT LT from 20 June to 29 October 2022. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. We collected tips for you for smooth travelling during the busy summer season.

urls.title: Travel updates
urls.description: Helsinki Airport is the ideal place to start and finish your journey. All flights depart from and arrive in one terminal. We currently have delays in the refund handling due to a higher than normally volume of refund applications. Finnair leases an A320 aircraft from DAT LT from 20 June to 29 October 2022. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. We collected tips for you for smooth travelling during the busy summer season.

data.text: @71Dodger Hi! Some routes have been canceled completely until March next year,and we have limited flights to other destinations. You can visit the list of destinations to which we do not currently fly via the following link. https://t.co/78QniYxucf // Helmi

data.text:
@paulbcostello Hi Paul! You can request refund from our website. https://t.co/oFFK2IPFcB
Kindly notice that if you've booked your tickets through some travel agency, contact directly to them about refund. // Helmi

@Sancus84 Hi, apologies for the long handling time. Please send us DM with your full name, booking reference or ticket number and the route and date of the flight, so we can check your refund request. /Keijo

@renefiedbruins Hi, we are starting to ramp up our network gradually. Decisions for Joensuu route for winter 2020/2021 will be made later on when there is more visibility to how the demand develops.  /Krista from Finnair

data.text:
@noskaskas Hi! If your flights are cancelled, you can request full refund via this link https://t.co/oFFK2IPFcB.

Kindly notice that if you have booked your tickets through some other channel (travel agency for example), you need to contact direct to them about refund. // Helmi

@berthitasalinas Hi, if you refer to the flight on your reservation, then this flight is still scheduled to take off. Please send us a DM in case you have any further questions regarding your booking. //Mari
RT @DjsAviation: Certainly not grounded under the best circumstances, but this video from @Finnair showcasing their grounded fleet is truly…
We adjust volume-driven costs in line with demand and additionally target almost 80-million-euro permanent cost base decline from 2022 onwards. Read more: https://t.co/Mqzpjmcah1

Good night from @HelsinkiAirport ✈️ Right now our birds are resting, but we can’t wait for July when we start ramping up our operations gradually.

This video was taken by our Lead Engineer Heikki Kotiranta. https://t.co/CjV80gi06s

data.text: During COVID-19 times, the demand for urgent cargo shipments has increased.  We modified two Airbus A330 wide-body aircraft for cargo use by removing economy class seats from the cabin. Read more about the modification process: https://t.co/a9xrZ2pjKY #finnaircargo https://t.co/L58cVYSLa7
@Tobyanca Hello! Unfortunately flights to California are cancelled between 1st of July 2020 and 31st of March 2021//Hanna-Mari

data.text: From 1 July, we’re flying to some 40 destinations in Europe and Asia. You can check the current situation of our routes from the booking system on our website: https://t.co/mGfa2MGShH https://t.co/J1iDib4il6

@Tarppa100 Hi, I think that AMS is not listed in the article because we never stopped flying there. We will be flying to AMS 12 times a week in July and 14 times a week in August. /Krista from Finnair
